dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3798 IH: Executive Order 14233 Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14233 relating to establishment of the strategic Bitcoin reserve and United States digital asset stockpile.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Executive Order 14233 Act of 2025.

section.header: Codification of Executive Order EO 14233, establishment of the strategic bitcoin reserve and United States digital asset stockpile
section.text: Executive Order 14233 relating to the establishment of the strategic Bitcoin reserve and United States digital asset stockpile shall have the force and effect of law.
